posts.title: God has a purpose for our lives
posts.body:
God loves you so very much okay,
never give up on Him,
He loves you very much,
that is why He sent His Son Jesus Christ
To come and die for our sins!

posts.title: You are loved
posts.body: I want to tell you that you are loved beyond measure!
